Name: Average time from 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for 'Request Payment' to be completed after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Request Payment and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Request Payment and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Request Payment' for cases leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time it takes for 'Request Payment' after 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time to 'Request Payment' after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for 'Request Payment' in cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurred
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time it takes for 'Request Payment' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Request Payment' in cases without 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to 'Request Payment' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for 'Request Payment' completion in cases preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'
